tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    show_description TEXT,
    show_genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE episodes (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    air_date DATE,
    show_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES shows(show_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
    episode_id INT,
    viewer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes(episode_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewers(viewer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_id INT NOT NULL,
    viewer_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episode_air_dates(episode_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    airing_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    CONSTRAINT fk_show_id FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES shows(show_id)
);

CREATE TABLE episodes (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    episode_number INT,
    air_date DATE,
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    show_id INT,
    episode_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_viewer_id FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewers(viewer_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_show_id FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES shows(show_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_episode_id FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes(episode_id)
);
